Package org.microbean.invoke

package org.microbean.invoke
Provides classes and interfaces related to concepts embodied by the java.lang.invoke package.
Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
  • BootstrapMethods
  • ConstantBootstraps
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BootstrapMethods
    Useful constant bootstrap methods and methods that make sense to invoke from ConstantBootstraps.invoke(Lookup, String, Class, MethodHandle, Object...).
    ConstantDescs
    A utility class containing various ClassDesc constants.
